item.title: Tackling Server State complexity in Frontend Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Frontend development has become increasingly complex over the years, and with it, the need for efficient state management. Global State is one such programming pattern that has emerged as a solution to the problem of prop drilling.
